text: In a shelter of separate gravities, a special bond arose...
...Though these cats were very different, they became very close.
The connection between the two could become physical, keeping them close when pulled by one or the other...
...Though these cats were very different, they became very close.
Adopted into separate homes, the cats tried to reunite...
...But for them to be together again, they would scale even greater heights.
The weight of cannot be lifted alone...
...sometimes you gotta open a window to get a better view of home.
The two cats would need to grapple with a natural push and pull...
...The pathway up was difficult, but looked as soft as wool.
So close and yet so far away, they had to use their tether...
...Now high up in cradling clouds, the cat's had come together.
